channel.title: Yutian Tang's News
channel.description: Updated news from my work and research

item.title: Defended my Ph.D. thesis
item.author: Yutian Tang
item.description:
Defended my Ph.D. thesis

I successfully defended my thesis today!

item.title: Paper Accepted to ICPC 2018
item.author: Yutian Tang
item.description:
Paper Accepted @ ICPC 2018

One paper entitled "Cross Version Defect Prediction with Representative Data via Sparse Subset Selection" has been accepted to ICPC 2018!

item.title: Paper Accepted to ICPC 2017
item.author: Yutian Tang
item.description:
Paper Accepted @ ICPC 2017

Our paper entitled "Constructing feature model by identifying variability-aware modules." has been accepted to ICPC 2017!
